sentences.en: A confidentiality clause was added to the contract.
sentences.cn: 合同中加上了一项保密条款。

sentences.en: A final source of congressional power is the spending clause.
sentences.cn: 国会权力的最后一条来源是经费条款.

sentences.en: At present, there are three strands to commerce clause theory.
sentences.cn: 在当前, 《商业条款》理论有3个组成部分.

sentences.en: Green clause and red clause are basically the same.
sentences.cn: 绿条款和红条款基本相同.

sentences.en: He has a clause in his contract which entitles him to a percentage of the profits.
sentences.cn: 他的合同中有一项条款，使他有权分得一定比例的利润。

sentences.en: His test would contain only the kindly opening clause of my remark.
sentences.cn: 他的对证词应该只包含我给他的忠告开头那句情真意切的话.

sentences.en: Such legislation is virtually immune from restriction under the commerce clause.
sentences.cn: 按照《商业条款》,该立法不受限制的影响.

sentences.en: The intention of the clause is clear.
sentences.cn: 那条款的含义是清楚的.

sentences.en: The third clause of the contract specifies steel sashes for the windows.
sentences.cn: 合同的第三款指定使用钢窗.

sentences.en: There is a clause in the contract forbidding tenants to sublet.
sentences.cn: 合同中有一条款禁止承租人转租房屋。

sentences.en: They made a clause - by - clause rebuttal of the letter.
sentences.cn: 他们对这封信 逐句 作了反驳.

sentences.en: This has, in fact, turned out to be a wonderful escape clause for dishonest employers everywhere.
sentences.cn: 事实上，这已经成为所有狡猾的雇主们用来躲避责任的绝妙条款。

sentences.en: This last clause is a thinly-veiled threat to those who might choose to ignore the decree.
sentences.cn: 这最后一项条款明显是对那些可能会无视法令之人的威慑。

sentences.en: This reading of the property clause seems to be correct.
sentences.cn: 这种对财产条款的理解似乎是正确的.

sentences.en: This was a clause he never could comply with.
sentences.cn: 这个条件是他绝不能同意的.

sentences.en: What clause do you require in the contract?
sentences.cn: 你要求在合同中订上什么条款?

phrases.tran_cn: n. 状语从句；副词子句

trans.tran_en: a part of a written law or legal document covering a particular subject of the whole law or document
